extendedInfo.description: AAA Discounts is now AAA Mobile. Roadside assistance, member discounts, maps, gas prices, driving directions and more AAA member services and information now integrated into one app. This application replaces the separate AAA Discounts, AAA Roadside and AAA TripTik Mobile apps.KEY FEATURESRoadside Assistance* â AAAâs legendary service now available electronically 24/7, no phone call neededâ¢ Request roadside assistance electronically directly from the app with the ability to find you by your GPS location on your phoneâ¢ Instant battery replacement quotes (not currently available in all areas)TripTikÂ® - Trip planning with interactive maps and directionsâ¢ Updated gas prices at local gas stationsâ¢ AAA Office Locationsâ¢ Find AAA Approved Auto Repair locations with hours, contact information and available servicesâ¢ Research, find and book AAA Diamond Rated hotels with reviews, inspector notes and information on AAA member offers (where available)â¢ Research and find local restaurants, attractions, and campgroundsâ¢ Find electric vehicle charging stationsMember Discountsâ¢ Locate member discounts near you at over 114,000 locationsJoin AAAâ¢ Membership benefits that can save you time and moneyâand give you peace of mind whether you are at home or on the road*To receive Road Service, you must be a current AAA/CAA member.

reviews.title: Map crashes
reviews.comment: Every time I open maps it crashes. Motorola Atrix HD (MB886) Version 4.1.1. Please fix. I have downloaded the update and it still does not work  08/28/13 still not working. when I open maps and discounts all the app does is reload the tiles. Update needs fixed
reviews.author: Janet Fawkes

reviews.title: Has some bugs
reviews.comment: Maps and discounts button does not work..... Just takes you back to main screen.   Roadside assistance thru app very difficult to navigate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GUI issues
reviews.comment: Roadside Service request for required phone number, but would not accept my entry. Way to make a bad situation more frustrating.
reviews.author: David Witkowski

reviews.title: Still Blurry
reviews.comment: iOS port not designed for Android and meant for last decade\'s smartphone resolutions
reviews.author: Ivan C

reviews.title: Quite convenient
reviews.comment: Works fine lasts a long time.
reviews.author: Bob Mccoy

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: EVEN WIT NEW UPDATE - Crashes trying to access MAPS AND DISCOUNTS. Evidently, an on-going problem that is not being addressed. (LG Spectrum 2)
reviews.author: Skip Bradley

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The app is super helpful
reviews.author: Rob Pettersen

reviews.title: Still needs to be fixed
reviews.comment: Maps still crash after update. Droid RAZR Maxx HD
reviews.author: Ray McKnight

reviews.title: Fair app worse after update
reviews.comment: Difficult and confusing navigation within app after update.  No option to renew membership (or if it is there, it can\'t be easily found).  Not particularly useful.
reviews.author: William Jordan

reviews.title: Update ruined it
reviews.comment: Complete failure.  App continually brings you back to menu.  RAZR on jellybean.  Please fix.
reviews.author: Keith Wong

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: I like that everything you need is a finger tip away.
reviews.author: Eric Mathews

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: Especially when travelling
reviews.author: J Biltz

reviews.title: Inaccurate Wait Times
reviews.comment: Very inaccurate wait times for roadside service!! App also does not accommodate for rv service calls when towing a trailer.   Requests also have a tedious form to fill!
reviews.author: sean chung

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.comment: The app asks that I enable gps and so I thought when I call for road side assistance all my info including membership number and location would be sent to them but I had to spell everything out
reviews.author: sajish vl

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Aaron Gpc

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Gari Deveraux

reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Tim Armstrong

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: The Roadside app was much better, can\'t manage vehicles in \"manage vehicles section\" roadside requests now through website! What\'s the point, I can go through the website without this app! Really!
reviews.author: Simon Hartley

reviews.title: This is not even a app!
reviews.comment: All it does is open a browser inside this so called app. The roadside assistance app was so much better! Ever heard of if it ain\'t broke don\'t fix it
reviews.author: Corey Gill

reviews.title: Tried to use on recent trip
reviews.comment: We tried to use this app on recent trip to no avail. Only thing that worked a little was the route part. Nothing else worked. I might uninstall it and  use better apps. Please fix.
reviews.author: Karen Birr
